snippet: Howard Josepher, the head of a social services agency, says that what is needed is “to engage and maintain drug users with H.I.V.-AIDS and hepatitis, and those at high risk for infection, in peer-led education and support programs.”
lead_paragraph: Howard Josepher, the head of a social services agency, says that what is needed is “to engage and maintain drug users with H.I.V.-AIDS and hepatitis, and those at high risk for infection, in peer-led education and support programs.”
